Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
SWorld SWorld is a super-class for a scrolling world (horizontal, vertical, or both).

Author: danpost
Version: October 28, 2013 (v2.0)

To implement this super-class: (1) create a sub-class of this class (2) use a super(....) call to one of the constructors in this class (3) create the main actor (one that always stays in view) and call the setMainActor method (4) (optional) set a scrolling background image using a call to setScrollingBackground or fillScrollingBackground
NOTE: the order of steps above is very important

There are two methods to add other objects into the world: the standard method addObject(Actor, int, int) can be used to add a scrollable actor into the world a secondary method addObject(Actor, int, int, boolean) which is equivalent to the standard method, except that the boolean will indicate the scrollable state of the object.
